entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a person who has attacked and bound Harry Potter. He is described as having a callous voice.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is the location where Greyback and his companions have taken Harry Potter. It is mentioned that it is the son of a Ministry Official.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a person who has been attacked and bound by Greyback. He is described as having his heart pounding against the ropes around his ribs.

entities.name: ministry official
entities.description: A Ministry Official is mentioned as being related to Harry Potter. It is not specified what their role or position is.

relationships.description: Greyback has attacked and bound Harry Potter.
The event of Greyback attacking and binding Harry Potter took place at Malfoy Manor.
